core:dataAssignment.fromExpression: indexOf(list, selectedRow) %pageSize==(pageSize-1)|| size(list) == (indexOf(list, selectedRow) + 1) ? list[indexOf(list, selectedRow)]: list[indexOf(list, selectedRow) + 1]

core:action.core:comment: Loads the list from given list metadata.
Initialise for Post DB Filtering of the List
